column2: "Th-thanks very much. With this, I should be able to write a report."
"This is great...I was in trouble when I came here, but with so many scary-looking people, I couldn't talkâ€¦"
"So, when you started to talk to me, I felt so relieved... Really, thank you very much."
"Ah, I've got to get home and write my report. Um, by the way. I'm much obliged to you."
